Class NFCCommunicationFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • es.gob.fnmt.dniedroid.nfc.NFCCommReaderFragment
        • es.gob.fnmt.dniedroid.gui.fragment.NFCCommunicationFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.nfc.NfcAdapter.ReaderCallback, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, SignatureNotification
    @Deprecated
public final class NFCCommunicationFragment
extends NFCCommReaderFragment
implements SignatureNotification
    Deprecated.
    It will be no longer available in future releases.
    Default implementation of a Fragment to handle graphical interface for NFC communications.

      • updateInfo

        public void updateInfo​(NFCCommReaderFragment.NFCCommReaderFragmentListener.NFC_callback_notify notify,
                       java.lang.String title,
                       java.lang.String msg)
        Deprecated.
        Function that handle all the events included in NFCCommunicationFragmentWUI.NFCCommFragmentNotifyListener interface, to manage the graphical interface of the fragment. Title and message information passed will be updated in the fragment.
        Parameters:
        notify - type of event.
        title - information received.
        msg - information received.

      • updateInfo

        Deprecated.
        Function that handle all the events included in NFCCommunicationFragmentWUI.NFCCommFragmentNotifyListener interface, to manage the graphical interface of the fragment. Only the message information passed will be updated in the fragment.

        msg - information received.
